analyzed: pratisarā stotram
om namaḥ śrīpratisarāyai
amara oghaiḥ pūjitām tvām nataḥ asmi
pratipada jana rakṣā kāriṇīm sarvakālam
bhṛgu dahana samudra āpāta duḥkhe su rakṣām
ripu viṣa bhaya hatrīm rājya bhoga ādi kartrīm
parivṛta nija vargān bhakta datta apavargān
kalita durita vargān mokṣa lābha eka mārgān
kṛta nara sura sargān kārita anaṅga bhaṅgān
stuti kṛta muni gargān sarva rakṣā eka saṅgān
prahṛta sakala vighne sarva loka eka mānye
viṣama pada śaraṇye sarvadā tvām namasye
vasita iva araṇye dāvadagdhe virasye  /
m abhilaṣita phala āptyai kalpavṛkṣa agra vallīm
asura sura nara ādyaiḥ vandita aṅghri abja yugmā
murasi lalitā nānā ratna mālā ādi yuktām
uḍupati śata dīptām śaṅkha kunda avadātām
graha bhaya pariśāntām vajra sattva ātmikām tām
śravaṇa lalita lole kuṇḍale saṃvahantīm
mukuṭa maṇi śikhābhiḥ kāśitām tām namāmi
janani sakala duḥkhāt tāraṇī tvam prasīda

original: sapadi vigatarakṣāṃ rakṣa me mātaraṃ ca |
analyzed: sapadi vigata rakṣām rakṣa me mātaram ca
sa karuṇa ruditam mām tvad dayā svastha bhūtam
tvam gatiḥ tvam gatiḥ nau
paṭhati pratisarāyāḥ stotram etat sadā yaḥ
jvalana jala viṣāṇām cora śārdūlakānām
sa gada nidhanakānām bhītayā nāśayantī
pratipadamala bhagnam kāmunā dhairya lābham
nija jana pariyuktā dharma kāma artha vṛddhā
ripu gaṇa parimuktā saukhyam eva prabhuktā
dadati vipula bhogyam kāma dā sarvadā asau
nihata sakala pāpam mokṣam āyānti ca ante
vigalita nayana ambuḥ sa añjaliḥ saṃvilāpī
stutim iti pracakāra traibhavānām jananyāḥ

original: bhavatu mama tu saṃpat sarvabhāvā kṛśāno
analyzed: bhavatu mama tu saṃpad sarva bhāvā kṛśāno
tanu kuśala su rakṣāḥ ittham evam su cittaḥ

original: vipacatu mayi sarvaṃ mādṛśaṃ karma bhogyaṃ
analyzed: vipacatu mayi sarvam mādṛśam karma bhogyam
sa sura nara cayānām bhrātṛ mātṛ druhāṇām

original: kuruta kuruta dhairyaṃ yena mokṣaṃ sulabhyaṃ
analyzed: kuruta kuruta dhairyam yena mokṣam sulabhyam
jaṭhara nilaya vāsam mā astu pāpam kadācid
udara naraka vāsam ye tadā sa avatāram
satata śubha su cetāḥ sādhayiṣyāmi bodhim
kṛta jagati su rakṣām yena kaivalya prāptiḥ
iti mudita su cetāḥ karmaṇā digdha cittaḥ
pratisara avatāryām sā ambikām mā vilamba
aniśam iti vadan saḥ nindayan vai sva karma
pratibhaya viṣa digdhaḥ tasthivān arbhakaḥ san

original: muhuriha hi śaraṇyāṃ tāṃ smaran sarvarakṣām || 12 ||
analyzed: muhur iha hi śaraṇyām tām smaran sarva rakṣām
aho su dhanyā jagat eka mātā prakrānta daivā ripu varga bhītā
yasyāḥ prabhāvāt vihita atya pāpāt prayāti vahniḥ jala śītala tvam
prabhāvatā aho punar eva tasyāḥ

original: vahniṃ jalaṃ cāpi giriṃ sthalaṃ vai |
analyzed: vahnim jalam ca api girim sthalam vai
yasyāḥ smṛtena eva
vaiśvānaraḥ prāpa dvidhā ākṛtim tām
gopā śarīram hrada pāta śītam śaitam tu anāśa artham iva adhika uṣṇām
daiva ādi datta abhijane samantāt nitānta dūrāt ati pāpa dattām  /
pratisarā stotram samāptam
